content.body: Noam Rosenthal: I think we broke the spec with PR [#11762](https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/11762). We're now not setting the ongoing API method tracker anymore (I think you had ideas to remove it anyway). I'm filing an issue about it, so that we either reinstate it, or remove it.
content.formatted_body: Noam Rosenthal: I think we broke the spec with PR #11762. We're now not setting the ongoing API method tracker anymore (I think you had ideas to remove it anyway). I'm filing an issue about it, so that we either reinstate it, or remove it.

content.body: Oh got it. We should still be setting it in the same place we were before
There's a few gotchas that won't allow us to remove it yet
